item.title: N add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: N add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: N add a quote by kurt vonnegut
item.description: "If I should ever die, God forbid, let this be my epitaph: THE ONLY PROOF HE NEEDED FOR THE EXISTENCE OF GOD WAS MUSIC" -- kurt vonnegut

item.title: N add a quote by Victor Hugo
item.description: "Certain thoughts are prayers. There are moments when, whatever be the attitude of the body, the soul is on its knees." -- Victor Hugo

item.title: N add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "Whenever you feel like criticizing any one...just remember that all the people in this world haven't had the advantages that you've had." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: N add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "Here's to alcohol, the rose colored glasses of life." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: N add a quote by Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "That’s going to be your trouble — judgment about yourself. (Tender is the Night)" -- Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: N add a quote by John Grisham
item.description: "Some people have more guts than brains." -- John Grisham

item.title: N add a quote by Joseph Heller
item.description: "[They] agreed that it was neither possible nor necessary to educate people who never questioned anything." -- Joseph Heller

item.title: N add a quote by Joseph Heller
item.description: "The enemy is anybody who's going to get you killed, no matter which side he is on." -- Joseph Heller

item.title: N add a quote by James Joyce
item.description: "If anyone thinks that I amn't divine He'll get no free drinks when I'm making the wine But have to drink water and wish it were plain That I make when the wine becomes water again." -- James Joyce

item.title: N add a quote by Philip K. Dick
item.description: "My schedule for today lists a six-hour self-accusatory depression." -- Philip K. Dick

item.title: N add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "Death: "THERE ARE BETTER THINGS IN THE WORLD THAN ALCOHOL, ALBERT." Albert: "Oh, yes, sir. But alcohol sort of compensates for not getting them." -- Terry Pratchett
